location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Memo D82. Containing Tables of Salutes revised to 1913.'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is ordered in reverse chronological sequence with the exception of the earliest documents, which appear at ff 6-14.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at f 1 and terminates at f 74, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 1-74; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains successive revisions of a document entitled, 'Table of Salutes granted to Native Chiefs and Nobles of India and to certain Chiefs near Aden and in the Persian Gulf'. The editions are dated between 1860 and 1913.Each edition is accompanied by correspondence between government departments regarding revisions to be made to the tables and forwarding the newly revised tables to the Secretary of State for India. Folios 20-21 reproduce correspondence relating to the delivery of insignia of the KCIE to the Shaikh of Mohammerah.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
